Sequence Information.Peptide Name: GE-18 (Synthetic AMPs, LL-37 derived, XXA, UCLL1c)
Sequence Information.Source: G+Sequence truncation of LL-37, human cathelicidin analog, animal-derived, natural derivative

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (94.44%) toLL-37 derived major antimicrobial peptide GF-17Activity: active against S. aureus USA300 (MIC 60 uM) and E. coli K-12 (MIC 60 uM).
Literature Information.Author: Wang G, Epand RF, Mishra B, Lushnikova T, Thomas VC, Bayles KW, Epand RM. 2012
Literature Information.Title: Decoding the functional roles of cationic side chains of the major antimicrobial region of human cathelicidin LL-37
